verbs.description: A man ’s photos of [ARG1: a cloud] [V: appearing] [C-ARG1: to resemble President Donald Trump] are going viral on social media .
A man ’s photos of [ARG1: a cloud] appearing to [V: resemble] [ARG2: President Donald Trump] are going viral on social media .
A man ’s photos of a cloud appearing to resemble President Donald Trump [V: are] going viral on social media .
[ARG1: A man ’s photos of a cloud appearing to resemble President Donald Trump] are [V: going] [ARG2: viral] [ARGM-LOC: on social media] .
